newsitem.title: FRANCE: French field pea harvest to start next week.
newsitem.headline: French field pea harvest to start next week.

text.p: France's field pea harvest will get under way next week, with farmers due to make the first cuts in the southwest, industry group UNIP said on Friday.
It said in a report that crop development was one week ahead of average and yield potential was above or in line with last year's at the same stage, depending on regions.
But low rainfall over the past two weeks had revived concern over moisture shortages for the protein crop in many regions.
UNIP says France produced 2.59 million tonnes of field peas last year when the average yield was 4.83 tonnes per hectare.
It says plantings rose 79,000 hectares this year to around 615,000 hectares.
